name: MòŌóN
description:
The Major caught himself in a very uncomfortable situation! His spaceship fell down a mooncave and was blown to pieces. Hunt for the lost parts and rebuild your rocketship.. But beware.. it seems you are not the only one down there.

Please note that this is a work in progress! Send me your thoughts/suggestions and help me develop MòŌóN into a full game :)

Controls:
Keyboard+Mouse
Move: WASD (or left/right/up/down)
Shoot: Left Mousebutton
Pickup: E
View Map: M
Switch weapons: Mousewheel / 1, 2, & 3

Gamepad
Move: Left Thumbstick
Shoot: Right Trigger or Right Shoulder Button
Pickup: Triangle / Y
View Map: Square / X
Switch weapons: Cross and Circle / A and B

Credits:
Game by Pinqu! ( http://pinqu.net)
Music by TeknoAXE ( http://teknoaxe.com/)
